title: AutoBotx Workshop
description: We are thrilled to invite you to the Autobotx Workshop, organised by the Robotics and automation society of IEEE-DBIT, where innovation meets hands-on learning! Time:  26th February - 2:00 to 5:00 and  27 & 28th February-10:00 to 5 . 📍Venue : Seminar Hall, DBIT... 🤖 Workshop Highlights: 📌 Dive into the world of robotics with expert-led sessions and hands-on activities. 📌 Introduction to Fusion360 to design, analyse and review the design of their bot. 📌Working with integration of sensors to execute autonomy.
